CropBatch.title: CropBatch
CropBatch.description: Represents a batch of crops stored in a storage location.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CropBatch entity.

cropType.description: Type of crop in this batch (e.g., wheat, corn, rice).

quantity.description: Quantity of the crop in this batch, in bags.

ratePerMonth.description: The storage rate per bag per month for this batch.

storageAreaId.description: Reference to the specific StorageArea within a location.

dateAdded.description: Date and time when the crop batch was added to storage.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this crop batch.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer who owns this batch.

customerName.description: The name of the customer for display purposes.

StorageLocation.title: StorageLocation
StorageLocation.description: Represents a storage location with a specific capacity.

id.description: Unique identifier for the StorageLocation entity.

name.description: Name of the storage location (e.g., Warehouse A, Silo 1).

capacity.description: Maximum capacity of the storage location, in bags.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this storage location.

mobileNumber.description: Contact mobile number for the warehouse.

address.description: Physical address of the storage location.

StorageArea.title: StorageArea
StorageArea.description: Represents a specific area within a StorageLocation.

name.description: Name of the area (e.g., Section A-1, Bin 5).

capacity.description: Maximum capacity of the area, in bags.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this area.

storageLocationId.description: The ID of the parent StorageLocation.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching Firebase Auth UID.

CropType.title: CropType
CropType.description: Represents a type of crop that can be stored, with custom storage rates.

name.description: Name of the crop type (e.g., Wheat, Corn).

ratePerMonth.description: Custom storage rate per bag per month.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who created this crop type.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer who stores crops.

mobileNumber.description: Contact mobile number for the customer.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who manages this customer.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to manage crop batches and storage locations for the CropSafe application. It prioritizes Authorization Independence by storing all necessary authorization data directly within the documents, avoiding hierarchical dependencies and complex `get()` calls in security rules. Access control is implemented by leveraging an 'ownerId' field on each document. This structure supports secure `list` operations by ensuring that the security rules can query based on this 'ownerId'. A `users` collection is included to store user profile information. A `cropTypes` collection is added to allow users to manage their own custom crop classifications, including custom storage rates. A `customers` collection is added to store information about the clients who own the crops. A subcollection for `areas` is added to each `storageLocation` to manage specific zones within a warehouse.
